smsFormat.regex_Format: (?i)Your [[account]] A/c has been debited with INR [[amount]] on [[date]] at [[time]] and account [[to]] has been credited..*
(?i)Your [[account]] A/c has been credited with INR [[amount]] on [[date]] at [[time]] received from [[to]]. UPI Ref.*
(?i)Your Citibank account [[account]] has been credited with [[to]] of Rs. [[amount]] on [[date]]. .*
(?i)Your a/c no.[[account]] is debited for Rs.[[amount]] on [[date]] and a/c [[to]] credited.*
(?i)Rs. [[amount]] spent on card [[account]] on [[date]] at [[to]]. Limit.*
(?i)Rs.[[amount]] is credited to your a/c [[account]] from Citi Account of [[to]] on [[date]] [[time]] \(Ref no..*
(?i)Payment of Rs.[[amount]] received for card [[account]] on [[date]]..*
(?i)Your Citi A/c [[account]] is debited for Rs.[[amount]] on [[date]] [[time]] for fund transfer request to [[to]] \(Ref. No.*
(?i)INR [[amount]] spent on ICICI Bank Card [[account]] on [[date]] at [[to]]. Avl Lmt.*
(?i)Dear Customer, ICICI Bank Account [[account]] is debited with INR [[amount]] on [[date]]. Info: [[to]]. The Available.*
(?i)ICICI Bank Acct [[account]] debited (?:for Rs|with INR) [[amount]] on [[date]][;|\.] [[to]] credited..*
(?i)Dear Customer, Payment of INR [[amount]] has been received towards your ICICI Bank Credit Card [[account]] on [[date]] through UPI..*
(?i)Dear Customer, your ICICI Bank Account [[account]] has been credited with INR [[amount]] on [[date]]. Info:[[to]]. The Available.*
(?i)ICICI Bank Account [[account]] is credited with Rs [[amount]] on [[date]] by Account linked to mobile number [[to]]. IMPS Ref.*
